titles.title: Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2013
To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reauthorize the juvenile accountability block grants program through fiscal year 2016.
Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2013

bill.summary: Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2013 - Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to extend through FY2016 the authorization of appropriations for the juvenile accountability block grant program.
